channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed

item.title: How Hackers Extracted the ‘Keys to the Kingdom’ to Clone HID Keycards
item.description: A team of researchers have developed a method for extracting authentication keys out of HID encoders, which could allow hackers to clone the types of keycards used to secure offices and other areas worldwide.

item.title: Perrigo voluntarily recalls 16,500 cans of baby formula because of excessive levels of vitamin D
item.description: For most infants, short-term consumption of the affected formula is unlikely to cause harm. But in a small subset of infants, such as those with impaired renal function, there is “the potential that consumption of the recalled product could result in health complications,” a statement said.
